elements.text: You are working on a project for your job but notice that you're struggling to move on to the next task. After revisiting the same details, you start to feel worried that your boss will be disappointed by your lack of progress. You take a step back and remember that when your boss sees the finished product, they will be...

elements.name: Work Details_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
